title: Dinolfo Cycles weld up a classic steel hardtail with all the standards
content:
Dinolfo Cycles has just released their first hardtail mountain bike. Like their gravel frame, the Dinolfo Hardtail is hand-fabricated from custom-butted 4130 steel tubing at their HQ in Wiesbaden, Germany. The brand decided to keep things classic and simple, opting to run all the common standards allowing the bikeâ€™s unique geometry to do all the

The post Dinolfo Cycles weld up a classic steel hardtail with all the standards appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
